modName: Unarmed Various actions Include Melee armed
summary:
This is simple, this script is only MCM setting. esp is playable without script(bsa & bsl).
Add a variety of attacks & defense & avoidance behavior.
Add abilities(If equipped with a "fist") & killmove(Diversion of one-handed) in unarmed.
Animation this MOD is using is a thing of vanilla all.
Now special attack (volun
descriptionHtml:
This is simple, this script is only MCM setting. esp is playable without script(bsa & bsl).
Add a variety of attacks & defense & avoidance behavior.
Add abilities(If equipped with a "fist") & killmove(Diversion of one-handed) in unarmed.
Animation this MOD is using is a thing of vanilla all.
Now special attack (voluntarily killmove) add on Unarmed / One-Handed / Two-Handed / Dual wield.

Video upload completed.(v1.0)
[youtube]N_-DreP2WvY[/youtube]

Note: Because I use the animation of killmove, becomes deadly attack.
Killmove being used is humanoid,dragon,falmer,animals,giant,etc.
Special attack is not effective in non-killmove race(DLC, MOD'race).
If you are not able to jump and lateral movement at 1st-person view, please change to 3rd person view and sneak. then back to original.

- Avoidance - (Enable only 3rd person view, not Magic or Spell equipped Right Hand)
After putting in the reverse direction at moment, to move in a direction to avoid.
Forward, Backward, Right, Left.

- Defense -
Left Attack without moving: blocking (normal/power attack while moving, even if you equipped torch/Dual/Left weapon)
Bash & Power Bash also made possible from the blocking.

- Attack -
・Unarmed
Sneak attack of left or right: move left/right/back = special attack (killmove) * 6 types in each direction and the left and right hands.
Power Attack of right: move left/right/back = special attack (killmove) * 5 random in the direction of one,Total of 15 types.
Power Attack of left: move back = Fist of giant // move side = side power attack(sweep)
Mounted Combat is enabled with bare hands.
・One-Handed/Two-Handed
Dual attack & move forward/left/right/back/stand
・Dual wield
Dual attack & move left/right/back

- Unarmed Abilities - No effect unless equipped with "Fist" or weapon to be treated as unarmed. (except Fists of blocking)
If you want to disable, use MCM(require SkyUI) or console.
set uvablock to 0 ;Disable Fists of Blocking(By block skill increases, Unarmed damage Increase.)
set uvasweep to 0 ;Disable Herculean strength(Power attacks with unarmed both hands hit all targets in front of you, and knockback.)
set uvatorch to 0 ;Disable Use of the torch(Equipped a torch, to give the fire damage by right hand attack in unarmed.)
set uvastomp to 0 ;Disable Fist of the giant(Equipped a torch, to give the fire damage by right hand attack in unarmed.)
set uvablocks to 0 ;Disable UnShield Charge(If user has the perk, enable shield charge even if not equipped shield.)

- Setting - use MCM(require SkyUI) or console.
set uvaavoid to 0 ;Disable the avoidance behavior for Player.
set uvaavoidnpc to 0/1/2 ; NPC avoidance setting, 0 = Disable, 1 = Normal frequency, 2 = High frequency.
set uvaattacku to 0/1 ; Special attack for unarmed.
set uvaattack1h to 0/1 ; Special attack for one-handed. (not dual wield)
set uvaattack2h to 0/1 ; Special attack for two-handed.
set uvaattackd to 0/1 ; Special attack for dual wield.
set uvablocku to 0/1 ; Start blocking by left attack without moving in unarmed.
set uvablock1h to 0/1 ; Start blocking by left attack without moving in left one-handed. (not dual wield)
set uvablockd to 0/1 ; Start blocking by left attack without moving in dual wield.
set uvakillpercent to 0.00 - 1.00 ; Health% for voluntarily killmove to Non-humanoid.

これは単純なMODで、スクリプトはMCMによる設定変更だけです。スクリプト(bsa&bsl)を除外してespだけでも利用可能です。
多様な攻撃＆回避＆防御を追加します。
素手の能力("拳"を装備した場合)＆キルムーブ(片手武器流用)を追加します。
このＭＯＤが使用しているアニメーションは全てバニラのものです。
今、特殊攻撃(任意キルムーブ)は素手・片手武器・両手武器・二刀流で使用可能です。

注意: killmoveのアニメーションを使用しているため、必殺の攻撃になります。
使用しているkillmoveはバニラのものなので、DLCやMODの種族に特殊攻撃は有効ではありません。
１人称視点で構えたまま横移動やジャンプが出来なくなった場合、３人称視点にして一度しゃがめば元に戻ります。

- 回避 - (3人称視点でのみ有効、魔法/杖を右手に装備していると無効)
一瞬逆方向に入れて移動方向に入れることにより回避行動
前後左右に回避できる

- 防御 -
動かずに左攻撃：ブロッキング（前に動きながらで通常攻撃/パワーアタック、たいまつ、左だけ片手武器、二刀流でも同様）
ブロックしてからバッシュ、パワーバッシュも可能となる

- 攻撃 -
・素手
左右のスニークアタックの後方移動、左移動、右移動に特殊攻撃(killmove)　左右各方向で6種類。
右のパワーアタックの後方移動、左移動、右移動に特殊攻撃(killmove) 各方向ランダムに5種類、合計15種類。
左のパワーアタックの後方移動に巨人の拳、左右移動で横パワーアタック(複数ヒット可能)
素手の騎乗戦闘が可能になる。
・片手武器/両手武器
移動しない又は前後左右移動しながら両手同時攻撃
・二刀流
後方/左/右移動しながら両手同時攻撃

- 素手の能力 - (護身の拳以外は"拳"か、素手扱いの武器を装備しないと効果無し）
無効にする場合はMCM(要SkyUI)かコンソールで以下の;より左の部分を打ち込んで下さい。
set uvablock to 0 ;護身の拳 無効(防御スキルの向上により、素手攻撃力が増加する)
set uvasweep to 0 ;怪力 無効(両手が素手の時、強力な攻撃は前方の全ての敵に打撃を与え、吹き飛ばす)
set uvatorch to 0 ;たいまつの活用 無効(たいまつを装備し右手が素手の時、右手の攻撃は炎ダメージを与える)
set uvastomp to 0 ;巨人の拳 無効(両手が素手の強力な左後方攻撃は巨人の一撃の様な衝撃を与える)
set uvablocks to 0 ;アンシールド・チャージ無効(パークを所持していれば、盾なしでシールド・チャージを使用可能)


- 設定 - MCM(要SkyUI) 又は コンソール.
set uvaavoid to 0/1 ;プレイヤーの回避行動 無効
set uvaavoidnpc to 0/1/2 ;NPCの回避行動設定、0 = 無効、1 = 通常の頻度、2 = 高頻度
set uvaattacku to 0/1 ; 素手の特殊攻撃
set uvaattack1h to 0/1 ; 片手武器の特殊攻撃 (二刀流は含まない)
set uvaattack2h to 0/1 ; 両手武器の特殊攻撃
set uvaattackd to 0/1 ; 二刀流の特殊攻撃
set uvablocku to 0/1 ; 素手で動かずに左攻撃で防御を始める
set uvablock1h to 0/1 ; 左片手武器で動かずに左攻撃することで防御を始める (右手武器なしの場合)
set uvablockd to 0/1 ; 二刀流で動かずに左攻撃することで防御を始める
set uvakillpercent to 0.00 - 1.00 ; 非人型への任意キルムーブが有効になる体力%


Change Log

Version 1.5
Unshield Charge.
"Herculean strength" add knockback.
Fix setting "Use of the torch" include torch attack.

Version 1.41
Fix 1.4 conflict between Unarmed dual attack and One-Handed special attack.

Version 1.4
・Include Melee armed, Now special attack (voluntarily killmove) add on Unarmed / One-Handed / Two-Handed / Dual wield.
・Left Attack without moving: blocking (normal/power attack while moving, even if you equipped torch/Dual/Left weapon)
・Fixed forward avoidance. now Backward special attack is not conflict with avoidance.
・Even if left hand is equipped Magic or Staff and right hand is not, can do avoidance.
・Allow Setting Health% for voluntarily killmove to Non-humanoid.

Version 1.3
Player Avoidance is Enable only 3rd person view.
After putting in the reverse direction at moment, to move in a direction to avoid.
Forward avoidance add.
NPC avoidance setting, 0 = Disable, 1 = Normal frequency, 2 = High frequency.
MCM or console.
Version 1.21
Add "fist" as the 1.2 fix. Ability did not work without equipped with a "fist". Add "uninstall" to MCM. "Uninstall" ON, then turned OFF, Add "Fist".No need to "fist" to the user of SkyRe.

Version 1.2
_Add Setting by MCM
_Add Vanilla Killmove in unarmed(Diversion of one-handed)
_Add Special Attacks(Diversion of vanilla killmove) in Right hand power attack.
Random 15 variations.
_Add Power Atacks in Left hand. side & backward. plus Special Effect.

Version 1.1
I will add a bit of ability. If you want to disable, use the console.
set uvaavoid to 0 ;Disable the avoidance behavior
set uvablock to 0 ;Disable Fists of Blocking(By block skill increases, Unarmed damage Increase <mag> points.)
set uvasweep to 0 ;Disable Herculean strength(Power attacks with unarmed both hands hit all targets in front of you.)
set uvatorch to 0 ;Disable Use of the torch(Equipped a torch, to give the fire damage by right hand attack in unarmed.)
- Avoidance - (In non-combat, disabled by 1st person view)
Left attack while moving, can be normal/power attacks even when equipped with a torch.
Mounted Combat is enabled with bare hands, Torch also can be equipped.

My Another Mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002]FollowerLivePackage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48566]Children can wear all[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57093]Throw Voice Dialogue FIx[/url]
